simple.sql

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.sql.Database

  • public class Database
extends Object
    This class attempts to simplify connections while keeping full control of what's happening.
    Created: Sep 1, 2004
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database(int type,
        String url,
        String schema,
        String catalog,
        String user,
        String password)
         throws ClassNotFoundException,
                SQLException
        This constructor is tailored to be used with some kind of login screen.
        Parameters:
        type - One of CON_*
        url - Usually the IP/hostname and the port
        schema - DBMS dependant
        catalog - DBMS dependant
        user - Username
        password - Password
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the needed driver cannot be found.
        SQLException - If the actuall connection fails.

      • Database

        public Database(int type,
        String driver,
        String url,
        String schema,
        String catalog,
        String user,
        String password)
         throws ClassNotFoundException,
                SQLException
        Parameters:
        type - One of CON_*
        driver - The package.package.class location of the driver.
        url - Usually IP/hostname and port number
        schema - DBMS dependant
        catalog - DBMS dependant
        user - Username
        password - Password
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the driver was not found.
        SQLException - If the connection fails.

      • Database

        public Database(String driver,
        String url,
        String user,
        String password)
         throws ClassNotFoundException,
                SQLException
        One of the two more advanced constructors.
        Parameters:
        driver - The package.package.class location of the driver.
        url - Driver dependant.
        user - Username
        password - Password
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the driver was not found.
        SQLException - If the connection fails.

      • Database

        public Database(String driver,
        String url,
        Properties props)
         throws ClassNotFoundException,
                SQLException
        Second of the two more advanced constructors.
        Parameters:
        driver - The package.package.class location of the driver.
        url - Location of the database. Format is driver dependant.
        props - Driver dependant properties used to define the connection.
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - If the driver was not found.
        SQLException - If the connection failed.
